policysearch.ActionUtility

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ActionUtility Functions.getUtilAct(State[][] states, ActionUtility[][] au, int i, int j, Action act)
      getUtilAct Method Finds the ActionUtility of the State using a specific action and the probability of taking the intended action.
      static ActionUtility Functions.maxUtilAct(State[][] states, ActionUtility[][] au, int i, int j)
      maxUtilAct Method Finds the ActionUtility with the highest Utility by using an ArrayList and sorting it using UtilityComparator.
      static ActionUtility[][] PolicySearchApp.policyEval(StateGrid stateGrid, ActionUtility[][] au)
      policyEval Method Updates the utilities in the ActionUtility given a specific Policy
      static ActionUtility[][] PolicySearchApp.policyIteration(StateGrid stateGrid)
      policyIteration Method Uses Policy Iteration to find the optimal policy and the best utility at each State of the Grid given a StateGrid
      static ActionUtility[][] PolicySearchApp.valueIteration(StateGrid stateGrid, double epsilon)
      valueIteration Method Uses Value Iteration to find the optimal policy and the best utility at each State of the Grid given a StateGrid and an error value epsilon

      int UtilityComparator.compare(ActionUtility a, ActionUtility b)
      Compares two ActionUtility objects and puts the ActionUtility object with the highest Utility in front List will be sorted in descending order Eg.
